com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.messaging.api

Interface Conversation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChatConversation, SMSConversation

    public interface Conversation
    Interface to expose Conversation SDK methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteConversation(MessagingCallback callback)
      Delete the specified conversation from the server
      void deleteMessage(java.lang.String messageID, MessagingCallback callback)
      Delete the specified message, associated with this conversation, from the server.
      void fetchMessage(java.lang.String messageID, FetchMessageCallback callback)
      Fetch the specified message, associated with this conversation, from the server.
      void fetchMessages(FetchCallback<java.util.List<Message>> callback)
      Retrieve at all messages associated with this conversation from the server.
      void fetchMessages(FetchOptions options, FetchCallback<java.util.List<Message>> callback)
      Retrieve at all messages by options associated with this conversation from the server.
      long getFirstMessageTime()
      Get the timestamp of the first message
      long getLastMessageTime()
      Get the timestamp of the last message
      long getLastPullTime()
      Get the timestamp of the last time the message list was retrieved from the server
      long getLastReceivedMessageTime()
      Get the timestamp of the last received message
      java.lang.String getLastText()
      Get the text content of the last message
      int getLength()
      Get the length of the message list
      java.lang.String getLocalAddress()
      Get the sender string
      java.lang.String getParticipant()
      Get the participant string
      void send(OutboundMessage message, SendMessageCallback callback)
      Send the message to the backend On success, the message object is internally updated with the server's response data

      • fetchMessages

        void fetchMessages(FetchOptions options,
                   FetchCallback<java.util.List<Message>> callback)
        Retrieve at all messages by options associated with this conversation from the server. The message list will be returned in the callback
        Parameters:
        options - the options to query parameters
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • fetchMessages

        void fetchMessages(FetchCallback<java.util.List<Message>> callback)
        Retrieve at all messages associated with this conversation from the server. The message list will be returned in the callback
        Parameters:
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • fetchMessage

        void fetchMessage(java.lang.String messageID,
                  FetchMessageCallback callback)
        Fetch the specified message, associated with this conversation, from the server.
        Parameters:
        messageID - the ID of the message to retrieve from the server
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • deleteMessage

        void deleteMessage(java.lang.String messageID,
                   MessagingCallback callback)
        Delete the specified message, associated with this conversation, from the server.
        Parameters:
        messageID - the ID of the message to delete from the server
        callback - a callback function to the calling application

      • send

        void send(OutboundMessage message,
          SendMessageCallback callback)
        Send the message to the backend On success, the message object is internally updated with the server's response data
        Parameters:
        message - the outbound message to send
        callback - a callback function to the calling application
